about_the_game:
The Supporter Pack is a collection of DLC goodies for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developers of Yield! Fall of Rome. It contains the following items:

  • Artbook - a collection of the Art of Yield!
  • Wallpaper - the ancient world of Yield! on display.
  • Soundtrack - deepen your immersion with 9 original music pieces.
  • Supporter UI Overlay - upgrade your main menu with an animated user interface.
  • 8 Companion Dogs (skin) - provide each faction leader with a trusty canine.
